SELECT COUNT(*) AS allMemberCount FROM MEMBER
WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE BOARD_REPORT_COUNT > 0
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND LOWER(B.BOARD_TAG_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{board_tag_name}||'%'

select rn, board_no, member_no, board_title, board_content, member_nick, board_date, board_report_count FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT M.MEMBER_NO,B.BOARD_NO,B.BOARD_CONTENT,B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_DATE,B.BOARD_REPORT_COUNT,M.MEMBER_NICK FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO where board_report_count > 0 order by board_report_count DESC )A )WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 10
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND M.MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
